    Reference

    All functions

    banner()

    Return path to template banner image

    cat_session_markdown()

    Print the Session Information Markdown

    create_skeleton_markdown()

    Create skeleton markdown template file

    create_template_in_package()

    Create template files in package in cwd

    create_wrapper_function()

    Create the wrapper pdfdocument function

    create_yml_description()

    Create a default YML description file

    docx()

    Return docx template as officer object

    docx_template()

    Return path to template docx

    ds_pdf()

    Generate PDF based on Generic Data Science Template

    encode_library()

    Encode library string as index

    get_environment_information()

    Return R runtime environment

    get_package_information()

    Retrieve package information.

    identify_template()

    Identify pkg and template from a pkg::template string

    latex_template()

    Return path to latex template file

    list_templates()

    List available templates within a package.

    new_markdown()

    Create markdown file based on existing template.

    print_session_information()

    Print R Session information as formatted output.

    style_environment_information_as_flextable()

    Style environment information as flextable output.

    style_environment_information_as_kable()

    Style environment information as kable output.

    style_package_information_as_flextable()

    Style package information as flextable.

    style_package_information_as_kable()

    Style package information as knitr kable.

    template_info()

    Extract template information from a template.

    use_banner()

    Use image as banner image in template

    use_session_markdown()

    Output session markdown text to file
